com.atakmap.android.maps

Class MapGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.atakmap.android.maps.FilterMetaDataHolder
      • com.atakmap.android.maps.MapGroup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HashtagSearch, DeepMapItemQuery, MetaDataHolder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultMapGroup

    public abstract class MapGroup
extends FilterMetaDataHolder
implements DeepMapItemQuery, HashtagSearch
    Collection of MapItems and child MapGroups. MapGroup's also contain dynamic properties which are observable. These properties are used to define component or user specific details about the MapItems in the group and child groups. A child group with the same dynamic property as a parent group in a sense overrides it's parents dynamic property when considering it own MapItems. Some built in core-components use pre-defined dynamic properties (such as the GLMapComponent for coloring and styling).

      • removeGroup

        public final boolean removeGroup(MapGroup group)
        Remove a MapGroup if it belongs to this one. If the group has its permaGroup metadata set to true, it will remain a child BUT all of its child groups and items will be removed.
        Parameters:
        group - the MapGroup to remove
        Returns:
        true if group belonged and was removed

      • removeGroupImpl

        protected abstract boolean removeGroupImpl(MapGroup group,
                                           boolean referenceOnly)
        Implements group removal.
        Parameters:
        group - the MapGroup to remove
        referenceOnly - If true only references to the group should be removed. This will be the common case when the remove is effected by adding the child to another group. If false it is assumed that the group is being disposed of.
        Returns:
        true if group belonged and was removed

      • findMapGroup

        public MapGroup findMapGroup(java.lang.String friendlyname)
        Finds and returns THE FIRST child map group of this map group with a friendly name that matches 'friendlyname'. NOTE: MapGroup names are not guaranteed to be unique. Make sure you know where you're searching before you grab a map group that may not be the one you actually want.
        Parameters:
        friendlyname - the friendly name of the group to find
        Returns:
        the FIRST map group encountered with a matching friendly name or null if it was not found

      • deepFindMapGroup

        public MapGroup deepFindMapGroup(java.lang.String friendlyname)
        Finds and returns THE FIRST child map group of this map group with a friendly name that matches 'friendlyname' in a breadth-first-search process. This means it will search all of its children before going back and checking its children's groups. NOTE: MapGroup names are not guaranteed to be unique. Make sure you know where you're searching before you grab a map group that may not be the one you actually want.
        Parameters:
        friendlyname - the friendly name of the group to find
        Returns:
        the FIRST map group encountered with a matching friendly name or null if it was not found

      • forEachItem

      • removeItem

        public final void removeItem(MapItem item)
        Removes the given MapItem from this map group, if it is a member. If it was not a member, returns normally, without throwing an exception.

      • removeItemImpl

        protected abstract boolean removeItemImpl(MapItem item)
        Implementation for removing an item from a map group. This will return true if the item was in the map group and removed, otherwise it will return false if the item was not in the map group.
